blank.not_message: must not be an empty string

instance_of.err_message: must be an instance of %s or its subclasses
instance_of.not_message: must not be an instance of %s or its subclasses

subclass_of.not_message: must not be a subclass of %s

length.maximum: must be at most {0} elements in length
length.minimum: must be at least {0} elements in length
length.range: must{0}be between {1} and {2} elements in length

email.err_message: must match regex pattern example lytuananh2003@gmail.com

password.err_message: Invalid new password, password needed:contains at least 8 characters,contains at least one number,Contains at least 1 lowercase letter (a-z), contain at least 1 capital letter (A-Z),contains only 0-9a-zA-Z. pattern: %s
password.not_message: Invalid new password, password not needed:contains at least 8 characters,contains at least one number,Contains at least 1 lowercase letter (a-z), contain at least 1 capital letter (A-Z),contains only 0-9a-zA-Z. pattern: %s
